message:
Hi Stephen  
Can you tell how many blocks can be connected in a dataflow mesh?  
I am trying to construct a graph by Dataflow blocks, see the figure. The nodes with "op" are operational blocks, the ones with no text - input nodes. Each operational node is represented by custom block. The problem is that when I create a graph in the figure with 256 x 256 nodes, it consumes a lot of memory and I get OutOfMemoryException, although I still have RAM.   
Do you know any restrictions about the number of the blocks?

 [https://uploads.disquscdn.c...](https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/56f3ed1a961150a4ae7c09b4877a3d009e0ef67ddec886b92f71503d6ebc40eb.png "https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/56f3ed1a961150a4ae7c09b4877a3d009e0ef67ddec886b92f71503d6ebc40eb.png")
